data.eml:eml: Mesobiotus datanlanicus sp. nov., a new tardigrade species (Macrobiotidae: Mesobiotus harmsworthi group) from Lâm Đ ồng Province in Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stec, Daniel (2019): Mesobiotus datanlanicus sp. nov., a new tardigrade species (Macrobiotidae: Mesobiotus harmsworthi group) from Lâm Đ ồng Province in Vietnam. Zootaxa 4679 (1): 164-180, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4679.1.10
